title: 2BD 2BA COMING SOON
posting_body: CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!
OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!
Diamond Hillside is your destination for spacious one and two-bedroom apartment homes located in Pittsburg, California.
We are centrally located near restaurants, shops, and public transportation.
You can’t go wrong with these East Bay apartments.
You can enjoy a dip in our Resort Style Pool or workout in a new and improved Clubhouse and Fitness Center.
Diamond Hillside is located right across the street from Los Medanos College and is in close proximity to Tri-Delta transit, the Antioch Shopping Mall, and other popular shopping and dining venues.
Come check out Diamond Hillside today!
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
If you are looking for apartments in Pittsburg, Concord, Brentwood, Oakley, and Clayton, Diamond Hillside Apartments is a great choice.
In addition, we are a great option for renters looking to move from the Greater Bay Area in Easy Bay, Walnut Creek, and Hayward area.
